title: Web Accessibility, Part 5: Multimedia, Animations, and Motion
description: Timed media accessibility, including captions, transcripts, audio descriptions, animations, visual transitions, vestibular disorders, and seizure disorders.
topics: Captions, Transcripts, Audio Descriptions, Sign Language Interpretation, Media Player Accessibility, Background Sounds, Seizure-Inducing Flashes, Animations and Motion, Auto-Play
